00011  * WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
00012  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU
00013  * General Public License version 2 for more details (a copy is included
00014  * in the LICENSE file that accompanied this code).

00022 /*
00023  * Copyright (C) 2015, Trustees of Indiana University
00024  *
00025  * Copyright (c) 2014, Intel Corporation.
00026  *
00027  * Author: Joshua Walgenbach <jjw@iu.edu>
00028  * Author: Kit Westneat <cwestnea@iu.edu>
00029  *
00030  * Implements the storage functionality for the nodemap configuration. Functions
00031  * in this file prepare, store, and load nodemap configuration data. Targets
00032  * using nodemap services should register a configuration file object. Nodemap
00033  * configuration changes that need to persist should call the appropriate
00034  * storage function for the data being modified.
00035  *
00036  * There are several index types as defined in enum nodemap_idx_type:
00037  *      NODEMAP_CLUSTER_IDX     stores the data found on the lu_nodemap struct,
00038  *                              like root squash and config flags, as well as
00039  *                              the name.
00040  *      NODEMAP_RANGE_IDX       stores NID range information for a nodemap
00041  *      NODEMAP_UIDMAP_IDX      stores a fs/client UID mapping pair
00042  *      NODEMAP_GIDMAP_IDX      stores a fs/client GID mapping pair
00043  *      NODEMAP_GLOBAL_IDX      stores whether or not nodemaps are active
00044  */
00045

00047 #include <linux/err.h>

00061 #include "nodemap_internal.h"

00063 /* list of registered nodemap index files */
00064 static LIST_HEAD(ncf_list_head);
00065 static DEFINE_MUTEX(ncf_list_lock);
00066 
00067 /* lu_nodemap flags */
00068 enum nm_flag_shifts {
00069         NM_FL_ALLOW_ROOT_ACCESS = 0x1,
00070         NM_FL_TRUST_CLIENT_IDS = 0x2,
00071 };
00072 
00073 static void nodemap_cluster_key_init(struct nodemap_key *nk, unsigned int nm_id)
00074 {
00075         nk->nk_nodemap_id = cpu_to_le32(nm_idx_set_type(nm_id,
00076                                                         NODEMAP_CLUSTER_IDX));
00077         nk->nk_unused = 0;
00078 }
00079 
00080 static void nodemap_cluster_rec_init(union nodemap_rec *nr,
00081                                      const struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00082 {
00083         CLASSERT(sizeof(nr->ncr.ncr_name) == sizeof(nodemap->nm_name));
00084 
00085         strncpy(nr->ncr.ncr_name, nodemap->nm_name, sizeof(nodemap->nm_name));
00086         nr->ncr.ncr_squash_uid = cpu_to_le32(nodemap->nm_squash_uid);
00087         nr->ncr.ncr_squash_gid = cpu_to_le32(nodemap->nm_squash_gid);
00088         nr->ncr.ncr_flags = cpu_to_le32(
00089                 (nodemap->nmf_trust_client_ids ? NM_FL_TRUST_CLIENT_IDS : 0) |
00090                 (nodemap->nmf_allow_root_access ? NM_FL_ALLOW_ROOT_ACCESS : 0));
00091 }
00092 
00093 static void nodemap_idmap_key_init(struct nodemap_key *nk, unsigned int nm_id,
00094                                    enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00095                                    u32 id_client)
00096 {
00097         enum nodemap_idx_type idx_type;
00098 
00099         if (id_type == NODEMAP_UID)
00100                 idx_type = NODEMAP_UIDMAP_IDX;
00101         else
00102                 idx_type = NODEMAP_GIDMAP_IDX;
00103 
00104         nk->nk_nodemap_id = cpu_to_le32(nm_idx_set_type(nm_id, idx_type));
00105         nk->nk_id_client = cpu_to_le32(id_client);
00106 }
00107 
00108 static void nodemap_idmap_rec_init(union nodemap_rec *nr, u32 id_fs)
00109 {
00110         nr->nir.nir_id_fs = cpu_to_le32(id_fs);
00111 }
00112 
00113 static void nodemap_range_key_init(struct nodemap_key *nk, unsigned int nm_id,
00114                                    unsigned int rn_id)
00115 {
00116         nk->nk_nodemap_id = cpu_to_le32(nm_idx_set_type(nm_id,
00117                                                         NODEMAP_RANGE_IDX));
00118         nk->nk_range_id = cpu_to_le32(rn_id);
00119 }
00120 
00121 static void nodemap_range_rec_init(union nodemap_rec *nr,
00122                                    const lnet_nid_t nid[2])
00123 {
00124         nr->nrr.nrr_start_nid = cpu_to_le64(nid[0]);
00125         nr->nrr.nrr_end_nid = cpu_to_le64(nid[1]);
00126 }
00127 
00128 static void nodemap_global_key_init(struct nodemap_key *nk)
00129 {
00130         nk->nk_nodemap_id = cpu_to_le32(nm_idx_set_type(0, NODEMAP_GLOBAL_IDX));
00131         nk->nk_unused = 0;
00132 }
00133 
00134 static void nodemap_global_rec_init(union nodemap_rec *nr, bool active)
00135 {
00136         nr->ngr.ngr_is_active = active;
00137 }

00139 /* should be called with dt_write lock */
00140 static void nodemap_inc_version(const struct lu_env *env,
00141                                 struct dt_object *nodemap_idx,
00142                                 struct thandle *th)
00143 {
00144         u64 ver = dt_version_get(env, nodemap_idx);
00145         dt_version_set(env, nodemap_idx, ver + 1, th);
00146 }
00147 
00148 static int nodemap_idx_insert(struct lu_env *env,
00149                               struct dt_object *idx,
00150                               const struct nodemap_key *nk,
00151                               const union nodemap_rec *nr)
00152 {
00153         struct thandle          *th;
00154         struct dt_device        *dev = lu2dt_dev(idx->do_lu.lo_dev);
00155         int                      rc;
00156 
00157         CLASSERT(sizeof(union nodemap_rec) == 32);
00158 
00159         th = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
00160 
00161         if (IS_ERR(th))
00162                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00163 
00164         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, idx,
00165                                (const struct dt_rec *)nr,
00166                                (const struct dt_key *)nk, th);
00167         if (rc != 0)
00168                 GOTO(out, rc);
00169 
00170         rc = dt_declare_version_set(env, idx, th);
00171         if (rc != 0)
00172                 GOTO(out, rc);
00173 
00174         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, th);
00175         if (rc != 0)
00176                 GOTO(out, rc);
00177 
00178         dt_write_lock(env, idx, 0);
00179 
00180         rc = dt_insert(env, idx, (const struct dt_rec *)nr,
00181                        (const struct dt_key *)nk, th, 1);
00182 
00183         nodemap_inc_version(env, idx, th);
00184         dt_write_unlock(env, idx);
00185 out:
00186         dt_trans_stop(env, dev, th);
00187 
00188         return rc;
00189 }
00190 
00191 static int nodemap_idx_update(struct lu_env *env,
00192                               struct dt_object *idx,
00193                               const struct nodemap_key *nk,
00194                               const union nodemap_rec *nr)
00195 {
00196         struct thandle          *th;
00197         struct dt_device        *dev = lu2dt_dev(idx->do_lu.lo_dev);
00198         int                      rc = 0;
00199 
00200         th = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
00201 
00202         if (IS_ERR(th))
00203                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00204 
00205         rc = dt_declare_delete(env, idx, (const struct dt_key *)nk, th);
00206         if (rc != 0)
00207                 GOTO(out, rc);
00208 
00209         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, idx, (const struct dt_rec *)nr,
00210                                (const struct dt_key *)nk, th);
00211         if (rc != 0)
00212                 GOTO(out, rc);
00213 
00214         rc = dt_declare_version_set(env, idx, th);
00215         if (rc != 0)
00216                 GOTO(out, rc);
00217 
00218         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, th);
00219         if (rc != 0)
00220                 GOTO(out, rc);
00221 
00222         dt_write_lock(env, idx, 0);
00223 
00224         rc = dt_delete(env, idx, (const struct dt_key *)nk, th);
00225         if (rc != 0)
00226                 GOTO(out_lock, rc);
00227 
00228         rc = dt_insert(env, idx, (const struct dt_rec *)nr,
00229                        (const struct dt_key *)nk, th, 1);
00230         if (rc != 0)
00231                 GOTO(out_lock, rc);
00232 
00233         nodemap_inc_version(env, idx, th);
00234 out_lock:
00235         dt_write_unlock(env, idx);
00236 out:
00237         dt_trans_stop(env, dev, th);
00238 
00239         return rc;
00240 }
00241 
00242 static int nodemap_idx_delete(struct lu_env *env,
00243                               struct dt_object *idx,
00244                               const struct nodemap_key *nk,
00245                               const union nodemap_rec *unused)
00246 {
00247         struct thandle          *th;
00248         struct dt_device        *dev = lu2dt_dev(idx->do_lu.lo_dev);
00249         int                      rc = 0;
00250 
00251         th = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
00252 
00253         if (IS_ERR(th))
00254                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00255 
00256         rc = dt_declare_delete(env, idx, (const struct dt_key *)nk, th);
00257         if (rc != 0)
00258                 GOTO(out, rc);
00259 
00260         rc = dt_declare_version_set(env, idx, th);
00261         if (rc != 0)
00262                 GOTO(out, rc);
00263 
00264         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, th);
00265         if (rc != 0)
00266                 GOTO(out, rc);
00267 
00268         dt_write_lock(env, idx, 0);
00269 
00270         rc = dt_delete(env, idx, (const struct dt_key *)nk, th);
00271 
00272         nodemap_inc_version(env, idx, th);
00273 
00274         dt_write_unlock(env, idx);
00275 out:
00276         dt_trans_stop(env, dev, th);
00277 
00278         return rc;
00279 }
00280 
00281 typedef int (*nm_idx_cb_t)(struct lu_env *env,
00282                            struct dt_object *idx,
00283                            const struct nodemap_key *nk,
00284                            const union nodemap_rec *nr);
00285 
00294 static int nodemap_idx_action(nm_idx_cb_t cb_f, struct nodemap_key *nk,
00295                               union nodemap_rec *nr)
00296 {
00297         struct nm_config_file   *ncf;
00298         struct lu_env            env;
00299         int                      rc = 0;
00300         int                      rc2 = 0;
00301 
00302         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_LOCAL);
00303         if (rc != 0)
00304                 return rc;
00305 
00306         mutex_lock(&ncf_list_lock);
00307         list_for_each_entry(ncf, &ncf_list_head, ncf_list) {
00308                 rc2 = cb_f(&env, ncf->ncf_obj, nk, nr);
00309                 if (rc2 < 0) {
00310                         CWARN("%s: error writing to nodemap config: rc = %d\n",
00311                               ncf->ncf_obj->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_obd->obd_name, rc);
00312                         rc = rc2;
00313                 }
00314         }
00315         mutex_unlock(&ncf_list_lock);
00316         lu_env_fini(&env);
00317 
00318         return 0;
00319 }
00320 
00321 enum nm_add_update {
00322         NM_ADD = 0,
00323         NM_UPDATE = 1,
00324 };
00325 
00326 static int nodemap_idx_nodemap_add_update(const struct lu_nodemap *nodemap,
00327                                           enum nm_add_update update)
00328 {
00329         struct nodemap_key       nk;
00330         union nodemap_rec        nr;
00331         int rc = 0;
00332 
00333         ENTRY;
00334 
00335         nodemap_cluster_key_init(&nk, nodemap->nm_id);
00336         nodemap_cluster_rec_init(&nr, nodemap);
00337 
00338         if (update == NM_UPDATE)
00339                 rc = nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_update, &nk, &nr);
00340         else
00341                 rc = nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_insert, &nk, &nr);
00342 
00343         RETURN(rc);
00344 }
00345 
00346 int nodemap_idx_nodemap_add(const struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00347 {
00348         return nodemap_idx_nodemap_add_update(nodemap, NM_ADD);
00349 }
00350 
00351 int nodemap_idx_nodemap_update(const struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00352 {
00353         return nodemap_idx_nodemap_add_update(nodemap, NM_UPDATE);
00354 }
00355 
00356 int nodemap_idx_nodemap_del(const struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00357 {
00358         struct rb_root           root;
00359         struct lu_idmap         *idmap;
00360         struct lu_idmap         *temp;
00361         struct lu_nid_range     *range;
00362         struct lu_nid_range     *range_temp;
00363         struct nodemap_key       nk;
00364         int                      rc = 0;
00365         int                      rc2 = 0;
00366 
00367         ENTRY;
00368 
00369         root = nodemap->nm_fs_to_client_uidmap;
00370         nm_rbtree_postorder_for_each_entry_safe(idmap, temp, &root,
00371                                                 id_fs_to_client) {
00372                 nodemap_idmap_key_init(&nk, nodemap->nm_id, NODEMAP_UID,
00373                                        idmap->id_client);
00374                 rc2 = nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_delete, &nk, NULL);
00375                 if (rc2 < 0)
00376                         rc = rc2;
00377         }
00378 
00379         root = nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_gidmap;
00380         nm_rbtree_postorder_for_each_entry_safe(idmap, temp, &root,
00381                                                 id_client_to_fs) {
00382                 nodemap_idmap_key_init(&nk, nodemap->nm_id, NODEMAP_GID,
00383                                        idmap->id_client);
00384                 rc2 = nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_delete, &nk, NULL);
00385                 if (rc2 < 0)
00386                         rc = rc2;
00387         }
00388 
00389         list_for_each_entry_safe(range, range_temp, &nodemap->nm_ranges,
00390                                  rn_list) {
00391                 nodemap_range_key_init(&nk, nodemap->nm_id, range->rn_id);
00392                 rc2 = nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_delete, &nk, NULL);
00393                 if (rc2 < 0)
00394                         rc = rc2;
00395         }
00396 
00397         nodemap_cluster_key_init(&nk, nodemap->nm_id);
00398         rc2 = nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_delete, &nk, NULL);
00399         if (rc2 < 0)
00400                 rc = rc2;
00401 
00402         RETURN(rc);
00403 }
00404 
00405 int nodemap_idx_range_add(const struct lu_nid_range *range,
00406                           const lnet_nid_t nid[2])
00407 {
00408         struct nodemap_key       nk;
00409         union nodemap_rec        nr;
00410         ENTRY;
00411 
00412         nodemap_range_key_init(&nk, range->rn_nodemap->nm_id, range->rn_id);
00413         nodemap_range_rec_init(&nr, nid);
00414 
00415         RETURN(nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_insert, &nk, &nr));
00416 }
00417 
00418 int nodemap_idx_range_del(const struct lu_nid_range *range)
00419 {
00420         struct nodemap_key       nk;
00421         ENTRY;
00422 
00423         nodemap_range_key_init(&nk, range->rn_nodemap->nm_id, range->rn_id);
00424 
00425         RETURN(nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_delete, &nk, NULL));
00426 }
00427 
00428 int nodemap_idx_idmap_add(const struct lu_nodemap *nodemap,
00429                           enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00430                           const u32 map[2])
00431 {
00432         struct nodemap_key       nk;
00433         union nodemap_rec        nr;
00434         ENTRY;
00435 
00436         nodemap_idmap_key_init(&nk, nodemap->nm_id, id_type, map[0]);
00437         nodemap_idmap_rec_init(&nr, map[1]);
00438 
00439         RETURN(nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_insert, &nk, &nr));
00440 }
00441 
00442 int nodemap_idx_idmap_del(const struct lu_nodemap *nodemap,
00443                           enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00444                           const u32 map[2])
00445 {
00446         struct nodemap_key       nk;
00447         ENTRY;
00448 
00449         nodemap_idmap_key_init(&nk, nodemap->nm_id, id_type, map[0]);
00450 
00451         RETURN(nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_delete, &nk, NULL));
00452 }
00453 
00454 static int nodemap_idx_global_add_update(bool value, enum nm_add_update update)
00455 {
00456         struct nodemap_key       nk;
00457         union nodemap_rec        nr;
00458         ENTRY;
00459 
00460         nodemap_global_key_init(&nk);
00461         nodemap_global_rec_init(&nr, value);
00462 
00463         if (update == NM_UPDATE)
00464                 RETURN(nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_update, &nk, &nr));
00465         else
00466                 RETURN(nodemap_idx_action(nodemap_idx_insert, &nk, &nr));
00467 }
00468 
00469 int nodemap_idx_nodemap_activate(bool value)
00470 {
00471         return nodemap_idx_global_add_update(value, NM_UPDATE);
00472 }
00473 
00487 static int nodemap_process_keyrec(struct nodemap_config *config,
00488                                   const struct nodemap_key *key,
00489                                   const union nodemap_rec *rec,
00490                                   struct lu_nodemap **recent_nodemap)
00491 {
00492         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = NULL;
00493         enum nodemap_idx_type    type;
00494         enum nodemap_id_type     id_type;
00495         u8                       flags;
00496         u32                      nodemap_id;
00497         lnet_nid_t               nid[2];
00498         u32                      map[2];
00499         int                      rc;
00500 
00501         CLASSERT(sizeof(union nodemap_rec) == 32);
00502 
00503         nodemap_id = le32_to_cpu(key->nk_nodemap_id);
00504         type = nm_idx_get_type(nodemap_id);
00505         nodemap_id = nm_idx_set_type(nodemap_id, 0);
00506 
00507         /* find the correct nodemap in the load list */
00508         if (type == NODEMAP_RANGE_IDX || type == NODEMAP_UIDMAP_IDX ||
00509             type == NODEMAP_GIDMAP_IDX) {
00510                 struct lu_nodemap *tmp = NULL;
00511 
00512                 nodemap = *recent_nodemap;
00513 
00514                 if (nodemap == NULL)
00515                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOENT);
00516 
00517                 if (nodemap->nm_id != nodemap_id) {
00518                         list_for_each_entry(tmp, &nodemap->nm_list, nm_list)
00519                                 if (tmp->nm_id == nodemap_id) {
00520                                         nodemap = tmp;
00521                                         break;
00522                                 }
00523 
00524                         if (nodemap->nm_id != nodemap_id)
00525                                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOENT);
00526                 }
00527 
00528                 /* update most recently used nodemap if necessay */
00529                 if (nodemap != *recent_nodemap)
00530                         *recent_nodemap = nodemap;
00531         }
00532 
00533         switch (type) {
00534         case NODEMAP_EMPTY_IDX:
00535                 if (nodemap_id != 0)
00536                         CWARN("Found nodemap config record without type field, "
00537                               " nodemap_id=%d. nodemap config file corrupt?\n",
00538                               nodemap_id);
00539                 break;
00540         case NODEMAP_CLUSTER_IDX:
00541                 nodemap = cfs_hash_lookup(config->nmc_nodemap_hash,
00542                                           rec->ncr.ncr_name);
00543                 if (nodemap == NULL) {
00544                         if (nodemap_id == LUSTRE_NODEMAP_DEFAULT_ID) {
00545                                 nodemap = nodemap_create(rec->ncr.ncr_name,
00546                                                          config, 1);
00547                                 config->nmc_default_nodemap = nodemap;
00548                         } else {
00549                                 nodemap = nodemap_create(rec->ncr.ncr_name,
00550                                                          config, 0);
00551                         }
00552                         if (IS_ERR(nodemap))
00553                                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap));
00554 
00555                         /* we need to override the local ID with the saved ID */
00556                         nodemap->nm_id = nodemap_id;
00557                         if (nodemap_id > config->nmc_nodemap_highest_id)
00558                                 config->nmc_nodemap_highest_id = nodemap_id;
00559 
00560                 } else if (nodemap->nm_id != nodemap_id) {
00561                         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00562                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00563                 }
00564 
00565                 nodemap->nm_squash_uid =
00566                                 le32_to_cpu(rec->ncr.ncr_squash_uid);
00567                 nodemap->nm_squash_gid =
00568                                 le32_to_cpu(rec->ncr.ncr_squash_gid);
00569 
00570                 flags = le32_to_cpu(rec->ncr.ncr_flags);
00571                 nodemap->nmf_allow_root_access =
00572                                         flags & NM_FL_ALLOW_ROOT_ACCESS;
00573                 nodemap->nmf_trust_client_ids =
00574                                         flags & NM_FL_TRUST_CLIENT_IDS;
00575 
00576                 if (*recent_nodemap == NULL) {
00577                         *recent_nodemap = nodemap;
00578                         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&nodemap->nm_list);
00579                 } else {
00580                         list_add(&nodemap->nm_list,
00581                                  &(*recent_nodemap)->nm_list);
00582                 }
00583                 nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00584                 break;
00585         case NODEMAP_RANGE_IDX:
00586                 nid[0] = le64_to_cpu(rec->nrr.nrr_start_nid);
00587                 nid[1] = le64_to_cpu(rec->nrr.nrr_end_nid);
00588 
00589                 rc = nodemap_add_range_helper(config, nodemap, nid,
00590                                         le32_to_cpu(key->nk_range_id));
00591                 if (rc != 0)
00592                         GOTO(out, rc);
00593                 break;
00594         case NODEMAP_UIDMAP_IDX:
00595         case NODEMAP_GIDMAP_IDX:
00596                 map[0] = le32_to_cpu(key->nk_id_client);
00597                 map[1] = le32_to_cpu(rec->nir.nir_id_fs);
00598 
00599                 if (type == NODEMAP_UIDMAP_IDX)
00600                         id_type = NODEMAP_UID;
00601                 else
00602                         id_type = NODEMAP_GID;
00603 
00604                 rc = nodemap_add_idmap_helper(nodemap, id_type, map);
00605                 if (rc != 0)
00606                         GOTO(out, rc);
00607                 break;
00608         case NODEMAP_GLOBAL_IDX:
00609                 config->nmc_nodemap_is_active = rec->ngr.ngr_is_active;
00610                 break;
00611         default:
00612                 CERROR("got keyrec pair for unknown type %d\n", type);
00613                 break;
00614         }
00615         rc = type;
00616 
00617 out:
00618         return rc;
00619 }
00620 
00621 static int nodemap_load_entries(const struct lu_env *env,
00622                                 struct dt_object *nodemap_idx)
00623 {
00624         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00625         struct dt_it            *it;
00626         struct lu_nodemap       *recent_nodemap = NULL;
00627         struct nodemap_config   *new_config = NULL;
00628         u64                      hash = 0;
00629         bool                     activate_nodemap = false;
00630         bool                     loaded_global_idx = false;
00631         int                      rc = 0;
00632 
00633         ENTRY;
00634 
00635         iops = &nodemap_idx->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00636 
00637         dt_read_lock(env, nodemap_idx, 0);
00638         it = iops->init(env, nodemap_idx, 0);
00639         if (IS_ERR(it))
00640                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(it));
00641 
00642         rc = iops->load(env, it, hash);
00643         if (rc == 0) {
00644                 rc = iops->next(env, it);
00645                 if (rc != 0)
00646                         GOTO(out_iops, rc = 0);
00647         }
00648 
00649         /* acquires active config lock */
00650         new_config = nodemap_config_alloc();
00651 
00652         if (IS_ERR(new_config)) {
00653                 rc = PTR_ERR(new_config);
00654                 new_config = NULL;
00655                 GOTO(out_lock, rc);
00656         }
00657 
00658         do {
00659                 struct nodemap_key *key;
00660                 union nodemap_rec rec;
00661 
00662                 key = (struct nodemap_key *)iops->key(env, it);
00663                 rc = iops->rec(env, it, (struct dt_rec *)&rec, 0);
00664                 if (rc != -ESTALE) {
00665                         if (rc != 0)
00666                                 GOTO(out_lock, rc);
00667                         rc = nodemap_process_keyrec(new_config, key, &rec,
00668                                                     &recent_nodemap);
00669                         if (rc < 0)
00670                                 GOTO(out_lock, rc);
00671                         if (rc == NODEMAP_GLOBAL_IDX)
00672                                 loaded_global_idx = true;
00673                 }
00674 
00675                 do
00676                         rc = iops->next(env, it);
00677                 while (rc == -ESTALE);
00678         } while (rc == 0);
00679 
00680         if (rc > 0)
00681                 rc = 0;
00682 
00683 out_lock:
00684         if (rc != 0)
00685                 nodemap_config_dealloc(new_config);
00686         else
00687                 /* creating new default needs to be done outside dt read lock */
00688                 activate_nodemap = true;
00689 out_iops:
00690         iops->put(env, it);
00691         iops->fini(env, it);
00692 out:
00693         dt_read_unlock(env, nodemap_idx);
00694 
00695         if (rc != 0)
00696                 CWARN("%s: failed to load nodemap configuration: rc = %d\n",
00697                       nodemap_idx->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_obd->obd_name, rc);
00698 
00699         if (!activate_nodemap)
00700                 RETURN(rc);
00701 
00702         if (new_config->nmc_default_nodemap == NULL) {
00703                 /* new MGS won't have a default nm on disk, so create it here */
00704                 new_config->nmc_default_nodemap =
00705                         nodemap_create(DEFAULT_NODEMAP, new_config, 1);
00706                 if (IS_ERR(new_config->nmc_default_nodemap)) {
00707                         rc = PTR_ERR(new_config->nmc_default_nodemap);
00708                 } else {
00709                         rc = nodemap_idx_nodemap_add_update(
00710                                         new_config->nmc_default_nodemap, 0);
00711                         nodemap_putref(new_config->nmc_default_nodemap);
00712                 }
00713         }
00714 
00715         /* new nodemap config won't have an active/inactive record */
00716         if (rc == 0 && loaded_global_idx == false)
00717                 rc = nodemap_idx_global_add_update(false, NM_ADD);
00718 
00719         if (rc == 0)
00720                 nodemap_config_set_active(new_config);
00721         else
00722                 nodemap_config_dealloc(new_config);
00723 
00724         RETURN(rc);
00725 }
00726 
00740 struct nm_config_file *nm_config_file_register(const struct lu_env *env,
00741                                                struct dt_object *obj)
00742 {
00743         struct nm_config_file *ncf;
00744         bool load_entries = false;
00745         int rc;
00746         ENTRY;
00747 
00748         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ncf);
00749         if (ncf == NULL)
00750                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00751 
00752         ncf->ncf_obj = obj;
00753         mutex_lock(&ncf_list_lock);
00754 
00755         /* if this is first config file, we load it from disk */
00756         if (list_empty(&ncf_list_head))
00757                 load_entries = true;
00758 
00759         list_add(&ncf->ncf_list, &ncf_list_head);
00760         mutex_unlock(&ncf_list_lock);
00761 
00762         if (load_entries) {
00763                 rc = nodemap_load_entries(env, obj);
00764                 if (rc < 0) {
00765                         mutex_lock(&ncf_list_lock);
00766                         list_del(&ncf->ncf_list);
00767                         mutex_unlock(&ncf_list_lock);
00768                         OBD_FREE_PTR(ncf);
00769                         RETURN(ERR_PTR(rc));
00770                 }
00771         }
00772 
00773         RETURN(ncf);
00774 }
00775 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nm_config_file_register);
00776 
00782 void nm_config_file_deregister(const struct lu_env *env,
00783                                struct nm_config_file *ncf)
00784 {
00785         ENTRY;
00786 
00787         lu_object_put(env, &ncf->ncf_obj->do_lu);
00788 
00789         mutex_lock(&ncf_list_lock);
00790         list_del(&ncf->ncf_list);
00791         mutex_unlock(&ncf_list_lock);
00792         OBD_FREE_PTR(ncf);
00793 
00794         EXIT;
00795 }
00796 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nm_config_file_deregister);
